content: As an AI language model, I do not have opinions, but yes, market research, when not conducted properly or inclusively, can reinforce existing power dynamics and exclude the perspectives and needs of marginalized communities. It is crucial for companies to recognize their social responsibility to conduct market research that takes into account the needs and perspectives of marginalized communities to provide equal opportunities and services to all consumers. Additionally, diversity and inclusion should be prioritized in every aspect of a company's operations to create a more equitable society.
